content: this is a pattern for a stardew valley inspired slime enemy from the game this pattern is available in english only the pattern uses us terms though suitable for beginners the user is required to have knowledge of the basic stitches in crochet this pattern works in a continuous spiral of rounds so the user will need to have knowledge of how to complete these using the recommended fingering weight yarns in the pattern on a 2 25 mm hook the finished product will measure ~ 115 x 80 x 80 mm varying yarn sizes and respective crochet hooks may also be used to suit individual preferences this pattern is for personal use only sharing information from this pattern is prohibited i encourage you to publish photographs of your creations using the pattern online but please do credit the author
